diff_hunk:
@@ -1809,6 +1809,27 @@
     CPU: _s_where_cpu
     CUDA: _s_where_cuda
 
+- func: norm_except_dim(Tensor v, int64_t pow=2, int64_t dim=0) -> Tensor
+  variants: function
+
+# VariableType::_weight_norm does not want to be given a gap in the autograd graph,
+# so we don't define "dispatch" variants for it.
+- func: _weight_norm(Tensor v, Tensor g, int64_t dim=0) -> Tensor
+  variants: function
+
+- func: weight_norm_cuda_interface(Tensor v, Tensor g, int64_t dim=0) -> (Tensor, Tensor)
body: This isn't intended to be public, so you should prefix it with an underscore. Ditto with `weight_norm_cuda_interface_backward` and `weight_norm_differentiable_backward`
body_html: This isn't intended to be public, so you should prefix it with an underscore. Ditto with weight_norm_cuda_interface_backward and weight_norm_differentiable_backward
body_text: This isn't intended to be public, so you should prefix it with an underscore. Ditto with weight_norm_cuda_interface_backward and weight_norm_differentiable_backward
